# OmiSuite

**A Comprehensive Toolbox for Deep Learning-based Multi-omics Data Analysis**

**Xiaoyu Zhang** (x.zhang18@imperial.ac.uk)

Data Science Institute, Imperial College London

## Introduction
OmiSuite is a comprehensive toolbox for deep learning-based multi-omics data analysis, which comprised of four components: 
- [**OmiVAE**](https://github.com/zhangxiaoyu11/OmiVAE): Integrated Multi-omics Classification using Variational Autoencoders
- [**OmiEmbed**](https://github.com/zhangxiaoyu11/OmiEmbed): A Unified Multi-task Deep Learning Framework for Multi-omics Data
- [**XOmiVAE**](https://github.com/zhangxiaoyu11/XOmiVAE): An Interpretable Deep Learning Framework for Cancer Classification using High-dimensional Omics Data
- [**OmiTrans**](https://github.com/zhangxiaoyu11/OmiTrans): The FIRST GANs-based Omics-to-omics Translation Framework
